p: Common method bias is often observed with self-reported questionnaires. In addition to alternating the application of various questionnaire design methods (including respondentsâ€™ confidentiality, the confidentiality of the meaning of questions and reversed questions), the present study placed behavior-oriented measurement questions at the end of the questionnaire. Analyzing the covariance matrices in order to verify the post hoc model thus reduced the potential impact of covariance.
